xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 28 August 2013
xwikidoc.content: <kushalkhandelwal> Hey sdumitriu 02:18 <kushalkhandelwal> How are you ? 07:14 <mcupak> has quit 07:52 <bvancea> has quit 09:01 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 09:13 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 10:57 <bvancea> has quit 11:09 <ravigarg27> has joined #phenotips 11:57 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 11:57 <sdumitriu1> Hey ravigarg27 11:57 <sdumitriu1> Did you manage to fix the build? 11:58 <ravigarg27> Hi sdumitriu1 11:59 <ravigarg27> I am trying to do that but am not able to, I think the problem again is with Lucene 11:59 <ravigarg27> so meanwhile I started to clean up the code 12:00 <ravigarg27> actually I dont how but its running perfectly on one branch but not on other 12:02 <ravigarg27> Also I had a query regarding updation of current selection 12:03 <ravigarg27> I am able to insert all those terms which are on the home page 12:03 <ravigarg27> but how should I access the other HPO terms 12:37 <marta> hi ravigarg27 12:37 <ravigarg27> Hi marta 12:37 <marta> i understand you have an issue updating the hpo term selection 12:37 <marta> here's something to inspire you: 12:39 <marta> do you see the yellow-ish box entitled "You might want to check for..." in the patient form, on top of the phenotype categories? 12:39 <ravigarg27> yup 12:39 <marta> it appears when you have a couple of phenotypes already selected 12:40 <ravigarg27> yeah right 12:40 <marta> so, deal with the selections _from_ that box, we use the following trick: we pretend that whatever the user selected from there was actually added using the "quick phenotype search" box which is right above 12:41 <marta> this way, all the events that we need (in order for all the pieces of the ui to be updated) are fired 12:41 <marta> so we don't need to do anything special 12:41 <marta> here's some code that does just that: 12:41 <marta> https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/blob/master/components/patient-data/ui/src/main/resources/PhenoTips/PatientSheetCode.xml#L2607 12:42 <ravigarg27> ohh okay I will try that 12:42 <marta> let me know if it's unclear 12:42 <marta> i'm not particularly proud of that code, it really needs some refactoring :) 12:42 <ravigarg27> yeah sure and Thank you very much for the referral 12:43 <marta> no problem :) I hope it wasn't too late though... 12:43 <ravigarg27> umm I dont think so 12:46 <ravigarg27> and also Kushal's mail actually said, for fall 2014 and spring 2015 12:47 <ravigarg27> :) 12:54 <kushalkhandelwal> Hey 12:55 <kushalkhandelwal> Hey sdumitriu and marta 12:55 <kushalkhandelwal> How are you ? 12:57 <sdumitriu1> Hey kushalkhandelwal 12:57 <sdumitriu1> Good, you? 13:07 <kushalkhandelwal> I am good :) 13:08 <kushalkhandelwal> So how is work ? 13:08 <sdumitriu1> Lots of it, as always 13:09 <kushalkhandelwal> Haha 13:09 <kushalkhandelwal> Nice :) 13:10 <kushalkhandelwal> Working on anything new ? 13:11 <sdumitriu1> Yes, right now on advanced permissions on patient sheets 13:13 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh good 13:13 <kushalkhandelwal> Anything I can work on ? 13:27 <ravigarg27> has quit 13:52 <Jim__> has quit 13:56 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 16:43 <Jim__> has quit
